meta.title: Classic Mac & Cheese
meta.description: You'll never have to use a packet of cheese sauce again!

ingredients.name: milk
ingredients.notes: You can use dairy milk or an unsweetened plant-based milk for this recipe.

ingredients.name: shredded cheese
ingredients.notes: Try blending different cheeses. 1 cup of cheddar with 1/2 cup of American is a good mix to start with.

steps.instructions: Bring 4 cups of water to boil in a large saucepan. When it has reached a rolling boil, add 8oz. of pasta.

steps.caption: bake
steps.instructions: Cook the pasta for 10 minutes, or until desired firmness.

steps.caption: make a batter
steps.instructions: Drain the pasta and set aside.

steps.caption: make a batter
steps.instructions: Melt 2 tbsp. of butter in the saucepan. When it has melted, add 2 tbsp. of flour and stir.

steps.caption: add seasoning
steps.instructions: Add 1 cup of milk, and stir until smooth and creamy.

steps.caption: add seasoning
steps.instructions: Add 1 1/2 cups of shredded cheese, and stir until smooth.

steps.caption: batter the cauliflower
steps.instructions: Spray a casserole dish or deep baking pan with cooking spray, then pour in the cooked macaroni.

steps.caption: spread the cauliflower
steps.instructions: Pour the cheese sauce over the macaroni, and stir to mix.

steps.caption: spread the cauliflower
steps.instructions: If desired, sprinkle the top of the macaroni with Parmesan cheese and/or bread crumbs.

steps.caption: bake
steps.instructions: Bake at 400° F for 20 minutes, or until the top is brown and bubbling.

steps.caption: spread the cauliflower
steps.instructions: Let cool for 5 minutes before serving.
